scripts.dev:basic: set SKIP_SEED=true&& set SKIP_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_DISABLE_SOURCEMAPS=1&& set FAST_REFRESH=false&& set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 && next dev
scripts.dev:webpack: set SKIP_SEED=true&& set SKIP_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_SRC_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_DISABLE_SOURCEMAPS=1&& set FAST_REFRESH=false&& set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 && next dev
scripts.dev:turbo: set SKIP_SEED=true&& set SKIP_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1&& set TURBO_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1&& set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=3072 && next dev --turbo
scripts.dev:ultra: set SKIP_SEED=true&& set SKIP_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1&& set TURBO_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1&& set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=3072 && next dev --turbo
scripts.dev:lightning: set NODE_ENV=development&& set TURBOPACK=1&& set NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1&& set SKIP_SEED=true&& set SKIP_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 && npx next dev --turbo
scripts.dev:rocket: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TURBOPACK=1 NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 SKIP_SEED=true SKIP_MIDDLEWARE=true NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 npx next dev --turbo
scripts.dev:stable: set SKIP_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_SRC_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_DISABLE_SOURCEMAPS=1&& set FAST_REFRESH=false&& set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 && next dev
scripts.dev:nonturbo: set SKIP_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_SRC_MIDDLEWARE=true&& set NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1&& set NEXT_DISABLE_SOURCEMAPS=1&& set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 && next dev
scripts.build:analyze: set ANALYZE=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 && next build
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:cache && echo All caches cleaned
scripts.clean:deep: npm run clean:all && if exist .tsbuildinfo del .tsbuildinfo
scripts.optimize: node profiler.js && echo Run ULTRA_PERFORMANCE_GUIDE.md for next steps
scripts.optimize:images: echo Image optimization - use next/image everywhere
scripts.postbuild: npm run analyze:bundle && echo Build completed successfully
scripts.deploy:prepare: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && npm ci --omit=dev && npm run build
